extendedInfo.description: NOW OVER 180 VIDEOS & GROWING!!!REAL VIDEOS for your LIVE WALLPAPERFREE VIDEO CATALOG plugin for the free Androidâ¢ app, Video Live Wallpaper from CCP Cre@ions.Bring some REAL LIFE to your Android device's Home Screen from the Official Video Provider for CCP Cre@ions!   * Professionally Produced by an EMMYâ¢-Nominated Studio!   * Over 180 Seamlessly-Looped Videos for a Seamless Experience!   * Over 25 FREE VIDEOS INCLUDED!   * Small File Size for Better Storage.   * Get MOST VIDEOS for ONLY .33 cents EACH!*The Videos found in this Catalog were produced Specifically for use with Video Live Wallpaper from CCP Cre@ions. We have chosen the optimal video format, size and compression to work perfectly as a Live Wallpaper, to minimize battery drainage and to play smoothly using the fewest system resources possible.High Quality Videos! EMMYâ¢-Nominated and with over 25 years of experience in Video, Television and Film, our emphasis on Quality is second to none. All video was filmed in High Definition with professional equipment and our animations were created with Award-Winning software.Many Categories to Choose From! Choices! This was very important to us when we created this catalog. With 11 categories including Abstract, Fire, FX, Nature, Water and more, you are sure to find something you will want!User Friendly Options! Interacting with the Catalog is both Simple and Friendly! We use thumbnails and even previews that allow you to see the video before making it the active wallpaper. There are also icons to show which videos you have already downloaded!Included in the catalog are over 25 FREE videos and over 100 that are available in packs of 3 for only $.99 USD. That's ONLY $.33 EACH! And we are adding even more High Quality videos to the catalog every month!About us! Point of View Concepts is an EMMYâ¢-Nominated production studio located in Florida. We produce multi-media products including Video Production, TelevisionProduction, Film Production, App Development, Animations, Website Design and Graphic Design. Our clients include Comcast, NASA, LavaLite, Mandarin Oriental, Paramount Studios, Electronic Arts, Popular Science and Central Florida Zoo.

reviews.title: defeats the reason the original app is awesome
reviews.comment: This runs on the awesome video live wallpaper app however as this uses short loops and some animated it makes it look like most other live wallpapers. I took the latest transformer trailer and cut it where optimus flys in spins and starts chopping the others apart I also used the last gun battle from equilibrium and a call of duty montage from youtube. With proper videos the app is awesome but this catalog is not and they also charge for some videos
